CmdLine: cd /tmp &&   wget http://nodejs.org/dist/node-latest.tar.gz &&   tar xvzf node-latest.tar.gz &&   rm -f node-latest.tar.gz &&   cd node-v* &&   ./configure &&   CXX="g++ -Wno-unused-local-typedefs" make &&   CXX="g++ -Wno-unused-local-typedefs" make install &&   cd /tmp &&   rm -rf /tmp/node-v* &&   npm install -g npm &&   printf '\n# Node.js\nexport PATH="node_modules/.bin:$PATH"' >> /root/.bashrc
Commands.Name: run
